1998 ACF Mid-Atlantic Regionals

The University of Maryland, College Park, in conjunction with the Academic Competition Federation, would like to officially announce the ACF Mid-Atlantic Regional tournament, to be held Friday and Saturday, February 27 and 28, 1998. Games will consist of untimed, 20-question rounds.

All queries about writing questions should be addressed to Matt Colvin. All packets should be sent to Matt as well.

The fee structure for the ACF M-A Regional will be similar to the one posted on the ACF website, with a couple of exceptions:

Base fee:  				$80
Each additional team:   		-10
Questions in to ACF by January 17:  	-30 + 55 Colvin packets
Questions in to ACF by January 24:  	-20
Questions in to ACF by January 31:  	-10
Working buzzer system:  		-10
Competent Moderator:  			-10
Schools who have not attended an 
ACFoundation tournament in the last 
calendar year:  			-10 per team
All packets must be in to Matt Colvin by February 14. If this is not feasible, negotiations may be possible. Please address any questions about the tournament itself to Adam Fine. We promise that this tournament will be run at top efficiency, and that there will be as few repeat questions as possible. Thank you, and we look forward to your registration.

Adam Fine
Maryland Academic Quiz Team
